audits.title: First Contentful Paint
audits.description: First Contentful Paint marks the time at which the first text or image is painted.

audits.title: Largest Contentful Paint
audits.description: Largest Contentful Paint marks the time at which the largest text or image is painted.

audits.title: Cumulative Layout Shift
audits.description: Cumulative Layout Shift measures the movement of visible elements within the viewport.

audits.title: Total Blocking Time
audits.description: Sum of all time periods between FCP and Time to Interactive.

audits.title: Background and foreground colors have a sufficient contrast ratio
audits.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read.

audits.title: Image elements have [alt] attributes
audits.description: Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text.

opportunities.title: Remove unused CSS
opportunities.description: Remove dead rules from stylesheets and defer the loading of CSS not used for above-the-fold content.

opportunities.title: Remove unused JavaScript
opportunities.description: Remove unused JavaScript to reduce bytes consumed by network activity.

opportunities.title: Efficiently encode images
opportunities.description: Optimized images load faster and consume less cellular data.

diagnostics.title: Minimize main-thread work
diagnostics.description: Consider reducing the time spent parsing, compiling and executing JS.

diagnostics.title: Avoid enormous network payloads
diagnostics.description: Large network payloads cost users real money and are highly correlated with long load times.
